Title: Establishes rental vouchers for working families
Summary: Establishes rental vouchers for working families; provides definitions; allows for families to make an application for rental vouchers at the appropriate social services district or any facilitated enrollment site authorized by the office of temporary and disability assistance; sets forth eligibility requirements.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 8-A §§310 - 314, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing rental vouchers for working families
